RelatedSentence: The victims - four men and three women - have not been identified , the Tamaulipas Coordination Group , or GCT , said in a statement .

RelatedSentence: The killings are related to conflicts involving the presumed criminal groups operating in the zone , the GCT , a joint federal and state agency , said .

The federal government said last week it was deploying more security forces units in Tamaulipas and planned to purge the state 's law enforcement agencies in an effort to stop a spike in drug - related violence .

Government Secretary Miguel Angel Osorio Chong announced the expanded deployment last Tuesday in the border city of Reynosa , unveiling a new phase of the federal security strategy for Tamaulipas aimed at restoring to residents the peace and safety they deserve .

RelatedSentence: Patrols will be stepped up at ports , airports , customs posts , border crossings and highways , with inspections of prisons and nightspots where criminal activities occur being expanded , Osorio Chong said .
